revised_title: On the Application of Harmonic Analysis to the Dynamical Theory of Tides: Part I. On Laplace's 'Oscillations of the First Species' and the Dynamics of Ocean Currents
tldr: The author investigates the application of harmonic analysis to the dynamical theory of tides, focusing on Laplace's 'Oscillations of the First Species' and the dynamics of ocean currents. The study aims to improve our understanding of tidal phenomena and their impact on oceanic oscillations.
